name: Sesame Ginger Dressing
description: So versatile! Use as dressing, marinade, or finishing sauce for stir-fry, meat, fish, and veggies. Double the recipe for a big batch.

ingredients.name: low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce

preparation: 1. In a Cruet, combine dressing mix, soy sauce, oil, and rice vinegar; shake well. Store in the fridge for up to 1 week.
tips: For a Creamy Sesame Ginger Dressing, add 1⁄4 cup nut butter to prepared dressing.
